page.title: 10SHOPPING STREETS IN HERNEBAY
page.content: Herne Bay's main shopping areas of Mortimer Street and the High Street are both included in this block. These streets still include some of the small family businesses which have tended to find it harder to compete in recent years. The shoe shop in William Street has boxes of shoes piled high and other wares hanging from the ceiling of the dark interior. A small sweet shop in the same street with shelves of glass jars and shining copper scales has just closed to make room for one of a chain of photo processing shops. Many of the small shops find it difficult to compete with the prices charged by the large superstores and many shoppers find it convenient to do all their shopping under one roof.
